name: Flower Shop in New York City
name_original: Flower Shop in New York City
description:
A young employee has just started work and doesn’t yet know how to properly evaluate the situation. Help her cope with not an easy task for her - to serve everybody so that they stay happy! Give her primary tasks and earn capital to open new flower shops! She will manage everything but only under your leadership!

FEATURES:
* More 50 Levels
* Huge store
* More than 6 types of flowers and bouquets
